long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does signing up for classes on PASS leave you flustered, aggravated, and feeling as though you just wasted your precious time?  Well, look no further: PassRatings is here to make your problems a thing of the past.  PassRatings will automatically integrate professor's Polyratings directly into PASS!  Each Polyrating links directly to the professor's page; no more opening millions of tabs when signing up for classes.

Enjoy!
